questions.question: What is economics

options.a: Economics is the study of the ALLOCATION of SCARCE resources to meet UNLIMITED human wants.
options.b: Economics is the study of the MANAGEMENT of SCARCE resources to meet NECESSARY human wants.
options.c: Economics is the study of the PROLIFERATION of AVAILABLE resources to meet UNLIMITED human wants.

answer.a: Economics is the study of the ALLOCATION of SCARCE resources to meet UNLIMITED human wants.

questions.question: What is microeconomics?

options.a: concerned with decision-making by individual economic agents such as firms and consumers.
options.b: concerned with decision-making by local economic agents such as local governments and consumers.
options.c: concerned with decision-making by global economic agents such as government authorities and international consumers.

answer.a: concerned with decision-making by individual economic agents such as firms and consumers.

questions.question: Which of the following is a macroeconomic topic?

options.a: why plumbers earn more than janitors
options.b: the reasons for the rise in average prices
options.c: the reasons for a rise in the price of orange juice

answer.b: the reasons for the rise in average prices

options.b: the reasons why Kathy buys less orange juice
options.c: the cause of why total employment may decrease

answer.b: the reasons why Kathy buys less orange juice
